short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculates the remaining time of a currently played video

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension allows you to track the remaining time of the currently playing video on any webpage with a video element. It displays the exact time when the video will end, so you can plan your time accordingly.
